breath2.respiration_length_min_help: (float) The minimum length of a breath instance to be detected.
breath2.interval_db_max_help: (int) The maximum db of a pause in the speaking to be a potential breath pause.
breath2.interval_peak_db_max_help: (int) The maximum of the peak of dbs in a pause to be a potential breath pause.
breath2.respiration_db_max_help: (int) The maximum db of a breath instance.
